description: This file defines an Angular component named TopAppBarComponent, which renders a responsive top application bar with title, back button, and action buttons, styled with CSS. It uses dependency injection to access feature flags and provides inputs and outputs for inter-component communication.

classes.name: TopAppBarComponent
classes.description: Angular component for a top application bar with optional back button, title, beta badge, and action buttons. It is designed to be responsive and styled according to the Ocean Professional theme.

methods.name: TopAppBarComponent
methods.description: Constructor initializes the component and injects FeatureFlagsService; no explicit code in the constructor.

methods.name: back.emit
methods.description: Emitted when the back button is clicked.

methods.name: primaryAction.emit
methods.description: Intended for emitting primary action events (not used in the current template).
